intro: Hemigraphis neocaledonica, commonly known as the velvetleaf or neon balm, is a flowering plant native to New Caledonia. Hemigraphis neocaledonica is valued in horticulture for its aesthetic appeal and ability to thrive in indoor or shaded garden settings.
